import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {db} from './firebase-config'; import {collection,getDocs, addDoc, doc, updateDoc, deleteDoc} from "firebase/firestore" import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography"; import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField"; import Container from "@material-ui/core/Container"; import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid"; import { Table as table } from '@material-ui/core'; function JobsSide() { const [jobs, setJobs] = useState([]) const [courseID, setCourseID] = useState(""); const [term, setTerm] = useState(""); const [type, setType] = useState(""); const [numPositions, setNumPosition] = useState(""); const [state, setState] = useState(""); const UsersCollectionRef = collection(db, "backenddata") useEffect(() => { const getUsersData = async () => { const data = await getDocs(UsersCollectionRef) setJobs(data.docs.map((elem) => ({ ...elem.data(), id: elem.id }))) } getUsersData() }, []) const CreateUser = async () => { await addDoc(UsersCollectionRef, { Courseid: courseID, Term : term, Type : type, NumPositions : numPositions, State : state}) } const deleteJob = async (id) => { const userDoc = doc(db, "jobs", id) await deleteDoc(userDoc) window.location.reload() } const CheckUser = async () => { await addDoc(UsersCollectionRef, { Courseid: courseID, Term : term, Type : type, NumPositions : numPositions, State : state}) window.location.reload() } const updateDB = async (id, courseID,term,type,numPositions,state) => { const userDoc = doc(db, "backenddata", id) const NewDoc = { Courseid: courseID, Term : term,Type : type, NumPositions : numPositions, State : state} console.log("Updated the Data on System") await updateDoc(userDoc,NewDoc) console.log("Updated the Data on the Server") window.location.reload() } return (
Admin Job Page { setCourseID(event.target.value)}} />

{ setTerm(event.target.value)}} />

{ setType(event.target.value)}} />

{ setNumPosition(event.target.value)}} />

{ setState(event.target.value)}} />

); } export default JobsSide;
